Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_9e4m5kwv&referenceId=tag:reuters.com,2022:newsml_OVFWFLTMP_K15&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Thomson Reuters

Description: OCP Ecuador, the operator of Ecuador's privately held heavy crude pipeline, suspended pumping crude on Saturday (January 29) as a preventative measure after it ruptured in the Amazon, and began cleaning and repairs.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/33VpkT3
